file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 26-25-01-04 - AUTODISCHARGE FIRE EXTINGUISHER BOTTLE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL AUTODISCHARGE FIRE EXTINGUISHER BOTTLE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures for the removal/installation of the autodischarge fire extinguisher. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AUTODISCHARGE FIRE EXTINGUISHER - ALL 26-25-01-000-801-A REMOVAL AUTODISCHARGE FIRE EXTINGUISHER - ALL 26-25-01-400-801-A INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 26-25-01 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-25-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. AUTODISCHARGE FIRE EXTINGUISHER - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives procedures for the removal of the autodischarge fire extinguisher. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Performs the task Passenger cabin H. Removal of the Autodischarge Fire Extinguisher (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Open the fire extinguisher door to access the autodischarge fire extinguisher (1). (2) Remove the autodischarge fire extinguisher (1) with the bolt (2) and the washers (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 26-25-01 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Autodischarge Fire Extinguisher - Removal/Installation Figure 401 EM145AMM260291B.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 26-25-01 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-25-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. AUTODISCHARGE FIRE EXTINGUISHER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives procedures for the installation of the autodischarge fire extinguisher. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Performs the task Passenger cabin H. Installation of the Autodischarge Fire Extinguisher (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the autodischarge fire extinguisher (1) with the bolts (2) and the washer (3).
